```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
path_bc = "SampleToBarcode.txt"
path_reads = "BarcodeToReads.txt"
```

```{r}
bc = read_tsv(path_bc)
reads = read_tsv(path_reads) 

reads.per.sample= inner_join(bc,reads,by="Sample") %>% select(InternalID,Sample,total)

```

```{r}
head(reads.per.sample)
```

```{r}
write_tsv(x = reads.per.sample,file="reads_per_sample_multiqc_VoolstraB728S.txt")
```
